contact.question: Has the abuser continued any contact?

data.Yes: Since you've heard from them, stay vigilant and keep your protection order handy if you have one.
data.No: Even without contact, keep your doors locked and your phone on in case you need to call 911.

protection.question: Do you have a protection order?

data.Yes: Carry your {legal_order} at all times and share copies with anyone who needs to know.
data.No: Consider applying for a protection order; it can help deter unwanted contact.

safety.question: Are you using any safety tools (cameras, door alarms)?

data.Yes: Make sure you're {equipment} is in working order and placed where you'll notice it.
data.No: Consider installing a simple door alarm or camera to alert you to unexpected entry.
